about_the_game:
• Fast-Paced Battles: Action-packed combat that keeps you on spinning

  • Explore diverse themed stages packed with unique challenges and monsters!

  • Tons of choices of fun weapons, items to customize your playstyle—go big or go home!

  • Choose from seven characters, each with their own awesome powers!

  • Team up with a buddy for double the fun, whether at home or online!

  • Gather materials from monsters or epic boss fights in themed chapters!

  • Before each battle, Cook Up Special Powers! Whip up a one-time dish to unlock unique abilities for that run!Fuse with your partner and HENSHIN! Merge into a one-of-a-kind combo character!

  • Prank with your friends by pooping near them (oof) or sacrifice them for mysterious, powerful weapons!

name: Henshin mybro! Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Henshin MyBro is a rogue-lite game full of nonstop fun! Play solo or with a buddy, scavenge ingredients from monsters and bosses, experiment with weapons, cook dishes for boosts, and HENSHIN to special heroes. Cook, fight, and HENSHIN your way to victory!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
